price: Nagsabi ito: “Sila itong nasa bakas ko at nagmadali ako tungo sa iyo, Panginoon ko, upang malugod Ka.”
arabic: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla hum ulāi ʿalā atharī waʿajil'tu ilayka rabbi litarḍā
